title: Saint Croix Island International Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Ranger-Led Programs Please inquire at the ranger station for daily activities such as porch talks and trail walks. Programs available during peak season.  Kids! Want to become a Junior Ranger? Discover cool things about Saint Croix Island International Historic Site! Ask for a Junior Ranger booklet at the visitor center and complete the activities on site. A park ranger will check your answers. Then take the official pledge and earn your very own patch! Free. Inquire at the Visitor Center. Activities last up to an hour in length.
